file_content.text: Always nice to see you, dearie. Now shoo! I'm cooking.
You must be here for my husband. I told master Viidu he's gone out fishing. Would you like a sweet flatcake instead? It's fresh.
This whole place is crawling with separatists. What's Trymbo doing out fishing?
Catching dinner, I hope. We're making Aqualish medley!
Eh, I could eat. You got any bantha milk to wash it down with?
I don't need your husband--just those fancy chemicals he makes. Where does he keep them?
Oh, he took his work with him. My butternut gets bored unless he has a dozen things to occupy him.
If you don't feel like waiting for Trymbo, the walk out to him is lovely. The beach is so relaxing.
Trymbo's at his fishing camp. He'll be thrilled to have some company. Now excuse me, dearie--these Rodian peppers won't cook themselves!
Goodness! I wasn't expecting guests. Give me a few moments, dearie, and I'll whip up some sweet flatcakes!
